column4: if you use openbox instead of metacity in gnome, you can scroll through desktops with the wheel just so long as you're over the desktop
Hmm, that's not a bad idea, actually.  I'll go find out if Fluxbox has the necessary bits and bobs, that's what I ran for the last n years :)

The only thing I've found lacking is Java support.  It's way too much hassle for a distro like Ubuntu where everything else just *works*.  Debian should petition Sun for a license to distribute Java -- the FreeBSD Foundation had one for a while.
have you tried make-jpkg? still not perfect by a long shot, but it does make it easy
